title: Motion Controls Robotics, Inc. Unveils Online Quoting Platform for Robotic Palletizing Systems
description: Motion Controls Robotics, Inc. (MCRI), a leading provider of robotic palletizing solutions, has launched a new online proposal portal for its BA Palletizer, making it faster and easier for manufacturers to receive system information, pricing, and lead time.
content:
FREMONT, Ohio, Aug. 13, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Motion Controls Robotics, Inc. (MCRI), a leading provider of robotic palletizing solutions, has launched a new online proposal portal for its BA Palletizer, making it faster and easier for manufacturers to receive system information, pricing, and lead time.

The BA Palletizer is redefining end-of-line automation for manufacturers who want consistent 24/7 throughput, safer operations, and faster ROI. Fast, Accurate Robotic Palletizing Quotes Now Available Online from MCRI

Powered by the FANUC CRX-30iA collaborative robot, it delivers a compact, portable design that can be installed in days, not weeks. Its intuitive no-code interface empowers operators to adjust pallet patterns on the fly, making it the perfect solution for facilities ready to add automation with speed, flexibility, and minimal disruption.

With the new online proposal form, customers can request a custom quote in minutes by entering their project details and production needs. The proposal includes system configuration, pricing, and delivery information. This streamlined process eliminates lengthy back-and-forth and speeds up decision-making.

To make the BA Palletizer even more accessible, MCRI offers flexible financing options through First American Equipment Finance. Customers can choose to purchase or lease while still taking advantage of Section 179 tax deductions, potentially saving more in taxes than their first year's payments.

"Our goal is to make automation easy to understand and quick to implement," said Scott Lang, President & CEO of Motion Controls Robotics. "The new proposal portal gives manufacturers the information they need to move forward, and the financing options make it possible to do so without straining their budget."

For more information or to start a BA Palletizer proposal, visit: https://motioncontrolsrobotics.com/collaborative-palletizer-quote-ba-palletizer/

Motion Controls Robotics (MCRI) provides solutions for customers by designing and building turn-key end of line applications, fulfillment solutions, and general material handling automation. MCRI offers unmatched capabilities to elevate companies to the next tier of Industry 4.0 by combining automation expertise with full plant and front office connectivity interfacing with ERP/WMS systems. MCRI has been implementing robotic automation since 1995, is a Certified Servicing Integrator for FANUC America, and Certified Integrator by the Association for Advancing Automation (A3) (formerly Robotics Industry Association).
